channel.title: Noble/Aristocrat (Unseen)/Apostle (Cult) Changes [UPDATED]
channel.description:
if the Aristocrat is killed, and the other one (who is now an Assassin) does not die ________________________________
Noble (Blue Dragon) Passive: Noble Twins: Speak to the other Noble at night. Day: Royal Blood: Can put your name forward to become the next King. Night: Secret Message: Send for a servant to Privately deliver a message in the morning.
________________________
Aristocrat [Unseen: Converted from Noble] Lore sample: Bought off by the Mastermind, this nobleman would do anything to amass wealth.
Passive: **Hidden Blade: If the Assassin is dead, your role does not change, but you gain another night ability. (The Mastermind may convert another player as usual)** Passive: Evil Twin: Can speak to the Noble at night. (Unseen messages appear as purple)
Day: Royal Blood: May become the King Night Ability 1: Soft Whisper: Send a servant to give an anonymous message in the morning. **Night Ability 2: Dark Dagger: Kill a target at night. Everyone will believe the Assassin did it.**
---------------------------------------------- Apostle (Cult) [Buffed] Passives **Royal Blood**: If converted from a Noble, may volunteer to become the King. **Blood Brothers**: If converted from the Noble, can talk to the other Noble. Cult messages appear in red. Dark Words: Cultists can hear the dead cultists, and speak to them
Day: Eavesdrop: Two uses, you may hear the next whisper. Day: Faint Whispers: **If converted from the Noble, send an anonymous message to anyone, and also a side message for all cultists**. If not converted from a Noble, send a message to all cultists.
